channel.title: [SRL] BeastFletcher *Leecher-Wanted Script*
channel.description:
[Version 0.43] -- Added faster banking by modifying OpenBankQuiet, made multiple DTMs for faster stuff, and, well, ya.
[Version 0.32] -- Awesome script, added Global Vars, and just overall better.
[Version 0.23] -- Very first script, worked decent.
Ok, reason for making this script. I bought Pmh100's autofletcher, filled all the information in, put it in the right spot, turned on the script, sat there, trying this many times, and guess what, it didn't work. So I thought, whatever, I can do better than this.
Well, yes, I have tried to sell this script, but I don't want to, I am not meant for script selling. And, my main, was banned for using an auto-fighter. So, I can't upgrade this script. I hope you all will pawn your bows as much as I did!
[QUOTE] ************************************* *******Ejjman1's BeastFletcher******* ****************v0.23**************** * We have been running for 48 Minutes and 15 Seconds * We have fletched 1261 bows(u). * We have strung 0 bows. * Thanks for using my BeastFletcher
************************************* *******Ejjman1's BeastFletcher******* ****************v0.32**************** * We have been running for 55 Minutes and 45 Seconds * We have strung 1264 bows. * We have earned 94800 exp by stringing. * We are stringing at a rate of 1387 an hour. * You are level 87 fletching. * Thanks for using Ejjman1's BeastFletcher. * We are finally done!
************************************* *******Ejjman1's BeastFletcher******* ****************v0.43**************** * We have been running for 37 Minutes and 37 Seconds * We have fletched 918 bows(u). * We have earned 68850 exp by cutting. * We are cutting at a rate of 1475 an hour. * You are level 87 fletching. * Thanks for using Ejjman1's BeastFletcher.[/QUOTE]
*******************INSTRUCTIONS******************* * * Line 46 and 47, fill them in * Low detail, bank, I suggest Fally West Bank * High Color, put bs (if stringing) in the first bank screen * Put type of log your cutting (if cutting) in first bank screen, only that type * Put knife in inventory or first bank screen * DONT PUT STRUNG BOWS IN TOP BANK SCREEN, if stringing.
*******************FEATURES*********************** * * Cuts plus fletches, you have option to choose that stuff * Banks * All kinds of bows * Multiples of 14 and 27..oh wait, I mean whatever you want * Global Variables * Newline := Newline; (Succesfully compiles so leechers aren't confused)
*******************BUGS************************ * If there is a level up, then the script stops * (None more)
I guess this would probably be my best script. So, put it to good use, and feel free to leech, cuz I have lost faith in my scripting, though this works insanely good.
-Ejjman1
P.S. - Post reports, rate, rep, whatever. :D

item.title: [SRL] BeastFletcher *Leecher-Wanted Script*
item.dc:creator: @ejjman1 ejjman1
item.description:
@ejjman1 wrote:

[Version 0.43] – Added faster banking by modifying OpenBankQuiet, made multiple DTMs for faster stuff, and, well, ya.

[Version 0.32] – Awesome script, added Global Vars, and just overall better.

[Version 0.23] – Very first script, worked decent.

Ok, reason for making this script. I bought Pmh100’s autofletcher, filled all the information in, put it in the right spot, turned on the script, sat there, trying this many times, and guess what, it didn’t work. So I thought, whatever, I can do better than this.

Well, yes, I have tried to sell this script, but I don’t want to, I am not meant for script selling. And, my main, was banned for using an auto-fighter. So, I can’t upgrade this script. I hope you all will pawn your bows as much as I did!

[QUOTE]

Ejjman1’s BeastFletcher
v0.23

  • We have been running for 48 Minutes and 15 Seconds
  • We have fletched 1261 bows(u).
  • We have strung 0 bows.
  • Thanks for using my BeastFletcher

Ejjman1’s BeastFletcher
v0.32

  • We have been running for 55 Minutes and 45 Seconds
  • We have strung 1264 bows.
  • We have earned 94800 exp by stringing.
  • We are stringing at a rate of 1387 an hour.
  • You are level 87 fletching.
  • Thanks for using Ejjman1’s BeastFletcher.
  • We are finally done!

Ejjman1’s BeastFletcher
v0.43

  • We have been running for 37 Minutes and 37 Seconds
  • We have fletched 918 bows(u).
  • We have earned 68850 exp by cutting.
  • We are cutting at a rate of 1475 an hour.
  • You are level 87 fletching.
  • Thanks for using Ejjman1’s BeastFletcher.[/QUOTE]

INSTRUCTIONS *

  • Line 46 and 47, fill them in
  • Low detail, bank, I suggest Fally West Bank
  • High Color, put bs (if stringing) in the first bank screen
  • Put type of log your cutting (if cutting) in first bank screen, only that type
  • Put knife in inventory or first bank screen
  • DONT PUT STRUNG BOWS IN TOP BANK SCREEN, if stringing.

FEATURES**** *

  • Cuts plus fletches, you have option to choose that stuff
  • Banks
  • All kinds of bows
  • Multiples of 14 and 27…oh wait, I mean whatever you want
  • Global Variables
  • Newline := Newline; (Succesfully compiles so leechers aren’t confused)

BUGS*****

  • If there is a level up, then the script stops
  • (None more)

I guess this would probably be my best script. So, put it to good use, and feel free to leech, cuz I have lost faith in my scripting, though this works insanely good.

-Ejjman1

P.S. - Post reports, rate, rep, whatever.

Read full topic
